definition: guests filled all the seats (idiom); a house full of distinguished visitors
guests filled the hall (idiom); a house full of distinguished visitors

sentences.english: Warmly welcome guests at home and abroad to come on their sightseeing or investment.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠歡迎海內外賓朋來旅遊觀光，投資興業。

sentences.english: The guests gathered in the banquet hall, the Great Hall of the People, which was filled with warm and festive atmosphere. The national emblem was placed above the podium.
sentences.chinese: 人民大會堂宴會廳內賓朋濟濟一堂，氣氛喜慶熱烈。
